message.raw:
Working on a rewrite. Created a Shot class in __init__.py, so one can instantiate a runviewer.Shot(h5_path).
a Shot has traces, Shot.traces, each of which is a runviewer.traces.Trace object. It is simple a wrapper around the data for each output trace.
